Sentencas: Compliance to certain temperature constraints is essential for the long life and stable operation of solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs).
Titulo: A nonlinear sliding mode observer for the estimation of temperature distribution in a planar solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: However, it is difficult and costly to measure the temperature inside a high temperature, well-sealed cell directly.
Titulo: A nonlinear sliding mode observer for the estimation of temperature distribution in a planar solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: A nonlinear sliding mode observer has been designed in this paper for estimating the temperature distribution in a hydrogen fed SOFC stack.
Titulo: A nonlinear sliding mode observer for the estimation of temperature distribution in a planar solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The observer design is based on a finite-volume parameter SOFC model, which is simplified by quasi-static mass balance assumption.
Titulo: A nonlinear sliding mode observer for the estimation of temperature distribution in a planar solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: In the observer design, a decoupling pole placement method that applies to multi-timescale systems is proposed to obtain a suitable observer gain.
Titulo: A nonlinear sliding mode observer for the estimation of temperature distribution in a planar solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: And a quasi-sliding mode control method is adopted to eliminate the chatter caused by the discontinuous control actions of sliding mode control.
Titulo: A nonlinear sliding mode observer for the estimation of temperature distribution in a planar solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: Theoretical analysis and simulation results are presented to prove the convergence and good performance of the designed observer for estimating the temperature distribution in a SOFC stack during steady-state and transient operation.
Titulo: A nonlinear sliding mode observer for the estimation of temperature distribution in a planar solid oxide fuel cell
